name: NSWritingDirection
desc: Constants that specify the writing direction.

items.name: case natural
items.desc: The writing direction of the current script that the system determines using the Unicode Bidi Algorithm rules P2 and P3.

items.name: case leftToRight
items.desc: The writing direction is left to right.

items.name: case rightToLeft
items.desc: The writing direction is right to left.
